search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Teamtailor (teamtailor.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Teamtailor is [https://www.teamtailor.com/pricing](https://www.teamtailor.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Pricing | Teamtailor
===============

[Teamtailor](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/)

Let us give you **a quote!**


==============================

Teamtailor is the all-in-one recruitment software with everything you need to hire successfully. Perfect for companies of all sizes — **from startups to enterprises**.

Teamtailor gives you:
---------------------

*   Powerful all-in-one recruitment software
*   Unlimited job postings and unlimited users
*   Customer support for all users
*   Over 250 features (and growing)
*   Integration with your existing HR tech stack
*   Free webinars and product tours
*   Full access to the Teamtailor Academy

*   ![Image 1](https://www.teamtailor.com/assets/api/badges/file/RecruitmentMarketing_EasiestToUse_Enterprise_EaseOfUse-1.svg)
*   ![Image 2](https://www.teamtailor.com/assets/api/badges/file/RecruitmentMarketing_MomentumLeader_Leader-1.svg)
*   ![Image 3](https://www.teamtailor.com/assets/api/badges/file/ApplicantTrackingSystems(ATS)_Leader_Mid-Market_Leader-1.svg)
*   ![Image 4](https://www.teamtailor.com/assets/api/badges/file/ApplicantTrackingSystems(ATS)_Leader_Leader-1.svg)
*   ![Image 5](https://www.teamtailor.com/assets/api/badges/file/ApplicantTrackingSystems(ATS)_Leader_Enterprise_Leader-1.svg)

Price request
-------------

Fill out this form and we'll be in touch with an estimate shortly.

Our customers see results 🚀
----------------------------

Collaborate better with their team

94%

See an increase in qualified candidates

97%

Say their hiring process is faster

89%

A proven concept

Why you'll love Teamtailor 💛
-----------------------------

*   ### It delivers results
    
    Over 8,500 companies and 125,000 users report a significant improvement in their recruitment workflows and accomplish goals quicker with Teamtailor.
    
*   ### It’s easy to use
    
    Teamtailor is designed with candidates and users in mind. It's intuitive and easy to use.
    
*   ### A personal and fun experience
    
    Our goal is to make growth a fun and enjoyable journey for you, your candidates, and your team.
    
*   ### Stay ahead of the competition
    
    We're continuously developing Teamtailor, adding more features to ensure our users stay on top.
    
*   ### You deserve the best service
    
    Our vision is to make our users smile. With a customer satisfaction score of 97%, you can be sure you'll get the help you deserve.
    
*   ### It's all about the candidate
    
    Teamtailor is built with candidates in mind. With our software, you can provide an outstanding experience for every candidate.
    

See what our users are saying:
------------------------------

"Excellent ATS for a scaling company with flexible hiring processes"

Jasmine A.

"This ATS is THE BEST I worked so far as it not only incorporates an user friendly experience but is also highly customizable".

Inês P.

Amazing tool for recruitment and employer branding!

Victoria C.

For anyone approaching Teamtailor as the first ATS used in an organisation, they'll discover how thoughtful the onboarding is.

Eugenio D.

There are a lot of good attributes that I like: the Career site is easily made your own, the recruitment parts that would take a lot of time are automated.

Isabella O.

The system is very modern - we switched from another recruitment system and now working with Teamtailor is a relief. It's much more candidate-friendly.

Dawid N.

What do I like best about Teamtailor? The automation and co-pilot AI solution. It's easy to use and easy to train people on the tool.

Burcu E.

Teamtailor has everything I need plus a little extra.

Hayley A.

I love Teamtailor! It gives us complete control of our recruitment processes, which is absolutely necessary when recruiting as much as we do.

Aksel H.

Teamtailor is by far the simplest and most efficient system I have experienced.

Philip R.

Solid ATS with strong user experience. Candidates love it. Easy to keep track of candidate processes.

Sophia B.

Teamtailor superfan! As a recruiter and HR lead at a small startup, Teamtailor makes my life a lot easier.

Emily J.

Excellent ATS and recruitment marketing system. Teamtailor is a flexible, competitively price applicant tracking and recruitment marketing system.

Victoria B.

Easy, intuitive, productive. It's so easy to collaborate and stay productive!

Karla S.

Very good experience. Easy to use, predictive. I really like and recommend this ATS.

Jerónimo H.

Outstanding product! Easy onboarding and the product is so easy to use.

Peter D.

Extremely friendly time and user-friendly software! Easy to use, helpful team, easy to modify for your company's needs.

Elina R.

Great level of automation and well-considered triggers to move volume candidates through the pipeline. A lot of time-saving tools versus other ATS providers

Gregor M.

Teamtailor is absolutely worth it! The product itself has made our recruiting efforts much easier.

Stephanie S.

Fantastic experience. It helps manage all my applicants and jobs.

Sarah P.

It's a perfect match for an HR professional/recruiter. Teamtailor is really user-friendly, has great features, and the team behind it is really helpful.

Kata T.

Life and time saver! Highly recommended. Teamtailor's ability to automate the hiring funnel has been game-changing.

Ryan GW.

Teamtailor is the ATS that all other providers wish they were.

Raphael F.

Incredible ATS with a super customer support!

Rita F.

After demoing 10+ ATS platforms, Teamtailor made sense for so many reasons.

Kylie B.

Great ATS! Teamtailor is very user-friendly, I love how visible everything is!

Milda L.

Great experience with the product and the team. Implementation is easy and support is really great.

Guillaume A.

Very smooth experience with Teamtailor! The interface, it really fits with the expectations of my generation and the mix of rigor and fun. 10/10 !

Anouk L.

Teamtailor is the ROCKSTAR of the ATS world!

Caitlin I.

Smooth and efficient. It's intuitive and saves a huge amount of time. More flexibility than similar software packages.

Sue W.

Recruitment made easy! Hands down, the best thing about Teamtailor has got to be how easy it is to use.

Tracey D.

Teamtailor has it all. Easy applications to fill, many optional features to use and quick responses from the support via chat.

Oskari H.

An excellent ATS. It's easy to use, intuitive, has a lot of features that all the team can use to improve the selection process.

Marc B.

Great all-in-one-solution!

Daniel V.

The best ATS on the market! The system is intuitive and even our hiring managers say it's simply fool-proof.

Karolina N.

It is so user-friendly. It's aesthetically pleasing, it's intuitive and it just makes sense. The support team are incredibly helpful!

Ibi E.

Easy to use and packed with features that save time, boost productivity, and assist users in finding better jobs and candidates.

Verified reviewer

Easy to use and filled with features to make every step of hiring efficient and quality-oriented.

Maria

Very good HR system. The recruitment is now much easier.

Evija

Easy to use, fun to use, and makes recruitment so much easier. And customer service is just one click away.

Sandra

Great level of automation and well-considered triggers within the recruitment pipeline.

Gregor

It's very user-friendly and intuitive to use - love it! It has definitely made our job easier and more effective. :)

Lucija

A great ATS for recruitment and employer branding.

Akshay

Teamtailor has been the best tool I have found with the best ROI ever.

Richard

I love that the system is modern, easy to use and has tons of smart functions that help me and my colleagues save a lot of time when recruiting.

Sara

The best ATS I've come across in my 10+ years experience of recruiting.

Alexandrina

Experience the magic of Teamtailor 🪄
-------------------------------------

Get in touch with us or try it out yourself

[Book a demo](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/demo)

Footer
------

### Product

*   [Applicant Tracking System](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/applicant-tracking-system/)
*   [Employer Branding](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/employer-branding/)
*   [ATS for Enterprise](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/applicant-tracking-system/enterprise/)
*   [ATS for small to midsize](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/applicant-tracking-system/small-midsize/)
*   [Features](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/all-features/)
*   [Integrations](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/integrations/)
*   [Pricing](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/pricing/)
*   [Try it free](https://tt.na.teamtailor.com/users/new?locale=en)

### Resources

*   [Our essence](https://career.teamtailor.com/pages/our-essence)

*   [Content hub](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/content-hub/)
*   [Help Center](https://support.teamtailor.com/)
*   [Partnerships](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/resources/partnerships/)
*   [API Documentation](https://docs.teamtailor.com/)

### Company

*   [Careers](https://career.teamtailor.com/)
*   [Customers](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/customers/)
*   [Contact](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/contact/)

### Legal

*   [Privacy Policy](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/privacy-policy/)
*   [Manage Cookies](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/cookie-policy/)
*   [Cookie Policy](https://www.teamtailor.com/cookie-policy/)
*   [Security & Data Protection](https://trust.teamtailor.com/)
*   [Code of Conduct](https://www.teamtailor.com/en-us/code-of-conduct/)

More than just an ATS, Teamtailor is the all-in-one recruitment software that companies and candidates love. Discover why over 10,000 of the smartest companies in the world use Teamtailor to attract talent and optimize their recruitment.

![Image 12](blob:http://localhost/5427bd182747929672ecfca946079cc2)

Teamtailor and our selected partners use cookies and similar technologies to ensure you get the best experience on this website. If you consent to it, we will use cookies for analytics purposes, to store your preferences for the site, and for marketing purposes.  
  
You can withdraw and manage your consent at any time, by clicking "Manage cookies" at the bottom of each website page.  
  
See our Cookie Policy to read more about the cookies we set.[Our Cookie Policy](https://www.teamtailor.com/cookie-policy/)

Disable non-necessary cookies Accept all cookies

Cookie preferences

![Image 16: Company Logo](https://cookie-cdn.cookiepro.com/logos/f5092a31-274f-433f-9503-fbc5792b2b84/fa881923-cda2-4d4e-8f8f-aabcef739147/5c87e46b-29c5-4677-b4b6-f47cf1ebe0d3/Large_-_Wordmark_-_Whitebg.png)

Privacy Preference Center
-------------------------

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[More information](https://www.teamtailor.com/en/cookie-policy/)

Allow All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

Cookies Details‎

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

Cookies Details‎

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

Cookies Details‎

#### Targeting Cookies

 Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Cookies Details‎

### Cookie List

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is provided upon request via a quote system. No specific tier or pricing details are publicly available.

94%

97%

89%

-----------------------------

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

Cookies Details‎

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

Cookies Details‎

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

Cookies Details‎

#### Targeting Cookies

 Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Cookies Details‎
